Description: A great example of a 2010 era EVH Wolfgang Special Guitar with original hard case, tremolo arm, tools, key, hang tag, and warranty card. Wonderful sunburst Quilt top. Guitar is in clean condition with minimal signs of use. The protective plastic is still on the back covers and the hardware shows no oxidation. This is the more desired 'Made in Japan' model as you can see in the rear headstock picture. Maple fretboard shows a lot of nice birdseye and the frets have no noticeable wear. Maple neck is straight and truss rod works fine. Recently the same model sold for $1200 and was described as 'New and Unplayed' (See Ebay item 253990913248) I have priced this one much less. Lower 48 USA states shipping is $49 with signature confirmation. USA Return Policy: Once the buyer receives the item, buyer has a 48 hour approval period and must contact me in that time frame with any issues. I will only accept returns for 'not as described' or 'damaged in shipping'. Items sold as 'for parts or repair' are non returnable. I am an individual (with a Job and Family) who has been selling used music related gear on Ebay for over 20 years with excellent service and my feedback reflects that. Before I list an item, I test it to make sure it works properly. I also take the pictures and describe each item as best I can. Since I sell used gear, I will never use the word 'mint' to describe what I am selling. ALL used gear will have imperfections and I describe them as I see them. The descriptor 'mint' is meant for brand new from the factory items and only authorized dealers get to use it to describe their items. If a buyer has any questions, please ask BEFORE buying. I also ask of all buyers to please do their due diligence to make sure they are fully aware what the item is and that it fits their intended application / purpose. If needed, buyer should get purchase approval from their spouse (or significant other) BEFORE buying. I treat my customers with respect and I ask that you do not treat me like the big box stores like Guitr Center. I thank you in advance for your understanding.
Title: 2010 era EVH Wolfgang Special Guitar JAPAN made Sunburst Quilt top & OHSC
ConditionDescription: Very clean condition with minimal signs of use.  Protective plastic still on back covers.  PLEASE READ AND UNDERSTAND THE COMPLETE DESCRIPTION BELOW.
